BusinessUnit Object¶

Purpose of BusinessUnit¶

The BusinessUnit object is the backbone of KPS, it structures the data needed for a business unit to exist, handles reading of input, creates ScanObjects, handles concurrency of scans, and parses output.

Using BusinesUnit¶

blah
